summary: An Ordinance amending paragraphs (2) and (5) of Section 4, and Section 15 of Ordinance No. 16675, entitled "An Ordinance relating to and regulating the use of steam boilers, providing for the inspection thereof, fixing the fees for such inspection, prescribing the powers and duties of the inspector of steam boilers, and prescribing penalties for violation thereof" approved August 9, 1907.
